title: Sitting at the bar or a communal table

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Server: Welcome to our restaurant! Would you like to sit at the bar or at a table?
turns.user_response_option_en: I'll sit at the communal table please!"
turns.ai_conversation_starter_ko: 서버: 레스토랑에 오신 것을 환영합니다! 바에 앉으시겠습니까 아니면 테이블에 앉으시겠습니까?
turns.user_response_option_ko: 공용 테이블에 앉을게요!"

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Server: Welcome to our restaurant! Would you like to sit at the bar or at a table?
turns.user_response_option_en: The bar sounds good to me!"

turns.user_response_option_ko: 바가 마음에 들어요!"
